import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}
  • {props.contactText}
{props.togglemode('primary')}} style={{height:'30px',width:'30px', cursor:'pointer'}}>
{props.togglemode('warning')}} style={{height:'30px',width:'30px', cursor:'pointer'}}>
{props.togglemode('success')}} style={{height:'30px',width:'30px', border: '100px', cursor:'pointer'}}>
{props.togglemode('danger')}} style={{height:'30px',width:'30px', cursor:'pointer'}}>
); } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, aboutText: PropTypes.string.isRequired, contactText: PropTypes.string.isRequired, mode: PropTypes.string.isRequired, togglemode: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; Navbar.defaultProps = { title: 'Set title here', aboutText: 'About text here', contactText: 'Contact text here', };
